steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_team_project_executions --> navigate to Page_executions
step 4: At Page_executions click on hyperlink_menu_visual_testing --> navigate to Page_katalon-eyes
step 5: At Page_katalon-eyes click on hyperlink_visual_baseline_collections --> navigate to Page_baseline-collection
step 6: Add visual checkpoint at Page_baseline-collection
